original_solution_mapping.L1: Three years from now, Kate will be 29 years + 3 years = <<29+3=32>>32 years old.
original_solution_mapping.L2: So by that time, Tully will be 32 years x 2 = <<32*2=64>>64 years old.
original_solution_mapping.L3: This means, Tully is 64 years - 3 years = <<64-3=61>>61 years old now.
original_solution_mapping.L4: Therefore, Tully was 61 years - 1 year = 60 years old last year.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 2963.
    Returns: Tully's age a year ago.
    """
    # L1
    kate_current_age = 29 # Kate is now 29 years old
    years_from_now = 3 # Three years from now
    kate_future_age = kate_current_age + years_from_now

    # L2
    tully_age_multiplier = 2 # twice as old
    tully_future_age = kate_future_age * tully_age_multiplier

    # L3
    tully_current_age = tully_future_age - years_from_now

    # L4
    years_ago = 1 # a year ago
    tully_age_last_year = tully_current_age - years_ago

    # FA
    answer = tully_age_last_year
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: Three years from now, Kate will be {kate_current_age} years + {years_from_now} years = <<{kate_current_age}+{years_from_now}={kate_future_age}>>{kate_future_age} years old.
So by that time, Tully will be {kate_future_age} years x {tully_age_multiplier} = <<{kate_future_age}*{tully_age_multiplier}={tully_future_age}>>{tully_future_age} years old.
This means, Tully is {tully_future_age} years - {years_from_now} years = <<{tully_future_age}-{years_from_now}={tully_current_age}>>{tully_current_age} years old now.
Therefore, Tully was {tully_current_age} years - {years_ago} year = {tully_age_last_year} years old last year.

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: Three years from now, Kate will be 29 years + 3 years = <<29+3=32>>32 years old.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: So by that time, Tully will be 29 years x 2 = <<29*2=58>>58 years old.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L3: This means, Tully is 58 years - 3 years = <<58-3=55>>55 years old now.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L4: Therefore, Tully was 55 years - 1 year = 54 years old last year.

explanation: Incorrect operand. The variable 'kate_current_age' (value: 29) was used instead of 'kate_future_age' (value: 32).
